topic.title: Gaclib 2.0
topic.p: The latest release is for Gaclib 2.0. A final version will be settled down after all development works are done for Gaclib 2.0.
Gaclib 2.0 has been upgraded to use C++20. I need to update VlppParser2 and Document repo before being able to generate document for the new code.
Please checkout the latest release if you are interested in it and able to use it by the help of unit tests in repos.

ul.li: Add ThemeName::SystemFrameWindow and ThemeName::CustomFrameWindow.
Add global hot key.
Replace OS dialogs with GacUI created dialogs for hosted mode.
Add SharedCallbackService.
Add GetCursorFromHitTest function.
DarkSkin types are included in GacUI XML Compiler as predefined types.
New static{} Workflow Script syntax for module initialization.
Adapt C++20's operator<=>.
Add LazyList<T>::OrderBySelf and LazyList<T>::OrderByKey
Refactor Tuple (breaking change), Pair and Nullable (affected Workflow Script).
Remove Lazy<T>.
Add SetupHostedWindowsGDIRenderer and SetHostedWindowsDirect2DRenderer for hosted mode on Windows.
Small breaking changes in IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget, INativeWindow, INativeWindowListener, GuiControl, GuiControlHost.
Add SharedAsyncService.
Remove key type arguments from containers.
LAMBDA macro is removed, please change LAMBDA([]...) to Func([]...).
MakePtr function is removed, please use Ptr(new T(...)) instead.
The contructor from T* to Ptr<T> becomes explicit.
Add more features for VlppParser2.
Fixed layout glitch.
Fixed unusual crashes on Direct2D in x64.
Added ARM intrinsic.
Added U8String for char8_t, U16String for char16_t, U32String for char32_t, with string conversion functions between all kinds of string types.
Regex, RegexLexer, RegexLexerWalker and RegexLexerColorizer supports all new string types.
vl::ParsingException is deleted and replaced by vl::regex_internal::RegexException.
Added Utf32Encoder and Utf32Decoder.
FOREACH macro is removed, FOREACH(TYPE, VAR, COLLECTION) is replaced by for(auto VAR : COLLECTION).
FOREACH_INDEXED macro is removed, FOREACH_INDEXED(TYPE, VAR, INDEX, COLLECTION) is replaced by for(auto [VAR, INDEX] : indexed(COLLECTION)).
All type traits invented in the library are removed, please use C++ standard type traits.
Linq supports generic lambda.
Calling BoxParameter multiple times on the same collection object returns the same Ptr<IValueXXX> pointer.
Calling UnboxParameter returns Unboxed<T> instead of filling the second argument.
Added IValueArray.
Improved Workflow script on collection behaviors.
Application for Windows need to link Vlpp.Windows.cpp, VlppOS.Windows.cpp and GacUI.Windows.cpp (which was GacUIWindows.cpp).
Application for other platforms need to link Vlpp.Linux.cpp and VlppOS.Linux.cpp.
New VlppGlrParser.h to deprecate VlppParser.h, GlrParserGen.exe to replace ParserGen.exe. The new parser library is highly recommended.
vl::parsing::xml is renamed to vl::glr::xml.
vl::parsing::json is renamed to vl::glr::json.

topic.title: Gaclib 1.0 Release Candidate 3
topic.p: Gaclib 1.0-rc3 is the latest release for Gaclib 1.0.
There are also links to indexed source code in documentation pages for classes and functions.
